00014 #include <LPC23xx.H>                        /* LPC23xx definitions */
00015 
00016 #include "type.h"
00017 
00018 #include "usb.h"
00019 #include "usbcfg.h"
00020 #include "usbhw.h"
00021 #include "usbcore.h"
00022 #include "memory.h"
00023 #include "LCD.h"
00024 #include "SerialLogger.h"
00025 #include "Nhac.h"
00026 
00027 
00028 /* Function that initializes LEDs                                             */
00029 void LED_Init(void) {
00030   PINSEL10 = 0;                         /* Disable ETM interface, enable LEDs */
00031   FIO2DIR  = 0x000000FF;                /* P2.0..7 defined as Outputs         */
00032   FIO2MASK = 0x00000000;
00033 }
00034 
00035 /* Function that turns on requested LED                                       */
00036 void LED_On (unsigned int num) {
00037   FIO2SET = (1 << num);
00038 }
00039 
00040 /* Function that turns off requested LED                                      */
00041 void LED_Off (unsigned int num) {
00042   FIO2CLR = (1 << num);
00043 }
00044 
00045 /* Function that outputs value to LEDs                                        */
00046 void LED_Out(unsigned int value) {
00047   FIO2CLR = 0xFF;                       /* Turn off all LEDs                  */
00048   FIO2SET = (value & 0xFF);             /* Turn on requested LEDs             */
00049 }
00050 
00051 /* Main Program */
00052 
00053 int main (void) {
00054 
00055   init_serial();
00056   LED_Init();
00057   InitSong();
00058   PLog("Start log...");
00059   newline();
00060   newline();
00061 
00062   PINSEL10 = 0;                             /* Disable ETM interface */
00063   /* LED Setup */
00064   lcd_init();
00065   lcd_clear();
00066   lcd_print ("MCB2300 MSD Demo");
00067   set_cursor (0, 1);
00068   lcd_print ("  www.keil.com  ");
00069 
00070   USB_Init(); 
00071 // USB_EndPoint0(1);                              /* USB Initialization */
00072   USB_Connect(TRUE);                        /* USB Connect */
00073 
00074   while (1);                                /* Loop forever */
00075 }
